description: Number of pure periods of length n for splitting games.
comments: Terms a(1) through a(11) were given in the reference, except that a(5) and a(11) are here corrected. a(12) and a(13) are new.
links: Ian Caines, Carrie Gates, R. K. Guy and Richard Nowakowski, Periods in taking and splitting games, Amer. Math. Monthly, 106 (1999), 359-361.
author: _John W. Layman_ and Charles K. Layman (clayman(AT)DIVX.com)
